```{r}
k = 4
param   <- as.list(coefs[k, ]); print(str(param))
par(mfrow = c(2, 1), mar = c(1.5, 2, 2, 1), mgp = c(3, 0.6, 0))
a <- rough_fitting(sitename, df, st, .FUN = wWHIT, lambda = 2, T)
title("wWH2")
b1 <- rough_fitting(sitename, df, st, .FUN = wWHIT, lambda = NULL, T)
title("wWHd")

b2 <- rough_fitting(sitename, df, st, .FUN = wWHIT, lambda = NULL, T, Ioptim_lambda = T)


info <- list(wWH2 = a$GOF,
             wWHd_v0 = b1$GOF,
             wWHd_latest = b2$GOF) %>%
    melt_list("meth") %>%
    # .[iter == "iter1"] %>%
    .[order(type, iter), -16]
print(info)
```
